TopicTitle: I love the _______ song, KSP style

Articles.Content:
Everybody has seen that discovery channel ad with the two astronauts singing, right?

Let's make a KSP version!

Copy the song from the person above you, and add a line or two.

Song:

I love the crashes,

I love Jool's lime green sky!

I love big blow-ups,

I love when rockets fly!

I love KSP;

And all of the ups and downs!

Not the Kraken, Not the Kraken,

Not the Kraken, Not the Kraken...

I love the crashes,

I love Jool's lime green sky!

I love big blow-ups,

I love when rockets fly!

I love KSP;

And all of the ups and downs!

Not the Kraken, Not the Kraken,

Not the Kraken, Not the Kraken,

I love the Kerbals

I love their faces too!

I love Jeb's antics.

I love the Space Planes too!

I love KSP;

And all screams and smiles!

Not the Kraken, Not the Kraken,

Not the Kraken, Not the Kraken...
